info.name: Classypedia (Razor-X)
info.description: Clean style for Wikipedia and other sites which use MediaWiki.
info.additionalInfo:
Source at github.com/razor-x/userstyles. Forked from Classypedia by Nathan Black. 2016-01-21
  • Normalize TOC spacing on Chrome.
  • Visible TOC hover color.
2016-01-21
  • Replace Roboto with Noto Sans and Noto Serif.
2015-05-01
  • Initial release.
